languages.text: Подстрекаемые слугами Вольного Торговца, простолюдины напали на проповедников и изгнали лжецов из колонии.
Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.
languages.original_text: Подстрекаемые слугами Вольного Торговца, простолюдины напали на проповедников и изгнали лжецов из колонии.

traits.locale_text: Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the liars out of the colony.
Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the liars out of the colony.
Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.

Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.

languages.text: Incitados por los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los plebeyos atacaron a los predicadores e hicieron que esos alborotadores engañosos dejaran la colonia.
languages.original_text: Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.

traits.locale_text: Incitados por los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los plebeyos atacaron a los predicadores e hicieron que esos alborotadores engañosos dejaran la colonia.

languages.text: Aiguillonnée par les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, une foule en colère s'est attaquée aux prêcheurs et les a chassés hors de la colonie.
languages.original_text: Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.

traits.locale_text: Aiguillonnée par les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, une foule en colère s'est attaquée aux prêcheurs et les a chassés hors de la colonie.

languages.text: 在行商浪人仆人的煽动下，许多平民袭击了布道士，将这群骗子赶出了殖民地。
languages.original_text: Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.

traits.locale_text: 在行商浪人仆人的煽动下，许多平民袭击了布道士，将这群骗子赶出了殖民地。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーのしもべに扇動された平民たちは、プリーチャーたちを攻撃し、欺瞞に満ちた連中をコロニーから追い出した。
languages.original_text: Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーのしもべに扇動された平民たちは、プリーチャーたちを攻撃し、欺瞞に満ちた連中をコロニーから追い出した。

languages.text: Von den Dienern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angetrieben, griff der Pöbel die Prediger an und jagte das gesamte trügerische Pack aus der Kolonie.
languages.original_text: Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.

traits.locale_text: Von den Dienern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angetrieben, griff der Pöbel die Prediger an und jagte das gesamte trügerische Pack aus der Kolonie.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârlarınca galeyana getirilen avam, vaizlere saldırarak sahtekârları koloniden defetti.
languages.original_text: Incited by the Rogue Trader's servants, the commoners attacked the preachers and drove the deceitful lot of them out of the colony.
